```{r}
#| label: cvevents
cvevents <- function(tbl, when, what, where, para1,para2) {

    command_start <- "\\cvevent"

    res <- paste0(
        command_start, "{", tbl[[when]], "}", 
        "{", tbl[[what]], "}",
        "{", tbl[[where]], "}",
        "{", tbl[[para1]], "}",
        "{", tbl[[para2]], "}"
        )

    cat(res, sep = "\n")
}
```
